subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which industry was crucial for the development of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के राष्ट्रीय योजना के लिए क्या विक्रमशास्त्रीय प्रश्न है।
explanation_en:
The mining industry played a significant role in the development of Rajasthan's economy. Rajasthan is rich in minerals and the mining sector contributed to the growth of the state.
English explanation:
The mining industry was crucial for the development of Rajasthan's economy as the state is rich in minerals.
